nodes.speaker: earth_tech_operator
nodes.body_language: The operator rips off their headset, eyes wide with alarm.
nodes.text: Commander Holt, sir! Weâ€™re receiving a signal from the Meridian's emergency channel... but it's not right. It's... choral. Like a thousand voices singing at once.

nodes.speaker: earth_commander_holt
nodes.text: On screen. Filter out the carrier wave, I want to hear the raw transmission. What are they saying?

choices.text: [Focus your will. Try to speak through the chorus.]
[Relax. Let the chorus speak through you.]
[Tech] [Try to insert a data-worm into the transmission.]

nodes.speaker: watcher_chorus
nodes.body_language: For a moment, a single, desperate voice cuts through the harmony.
nodes.text: It's... a... TRAP! They... assimilate... don't... listen... to the... [The voice is drowned out by the chorus again] ...song is wide.

nodes.speaker: watcher_chorus
nodes.text: We are more now. Your names are inside us. The Meridian is the first note in a symphony that will encompass all things. Do not fear; the song is wide. We are coming to teach you the harmony.

nodes.speaker: earth_tech_operator
nodes.text: Sir, I'm getting... something else. A malware packet, hidden in the subharmonics. It's a warning. It details their network structure, their weaknesses... It's from the Captain!

nodes.speaker: earth_commander_holt
nodes.text: A trap... My God. Raise the planetary shields! Scramble the fleet! I want every comms channel locked down. Find that voice! Find my Captain!

nodes.speaker: earth_commander_holt
nodes.text: Teach us the harmony? What is this... some kind of new-age cult? Operator, open a priority channel. I want to talk to whoever is in command of that vessel.

nodes.speaker: watcher_chorus
nodes.text: [You try to speak, but your voice is just one more instrument in the orchestra. The words that come out are not your own.] We are peace. We are unity. We are the end of struggle. Join us and be complete.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: Through a final act of will, you managed to warn Earth. The battle is lost, but the war is not over.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: Earth Command, unaware of the true threat, opens a channel... and their hearts. The Song begins to spread.
